alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:24PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pine County through 200 PM CDT... At 122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Quamba, or 13 miles northwest of Pine City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brook Park around 130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hinckley and Sandstone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
